author: p0W3RH311
body:
HI guys

if  i enabe  wide-transcription  with GPO  the transcription work great  but  if i enter  to interactive remoting  the output  its not capture in transcription file:
```

PS WIN8.1--VERSION  7.0 > enter-psseession server1    
PS WIN8.1--VERSION  7.0 > ps
# output
PS WIN8.1--VERSION  7.0 > ls
#output
PS WIN8.1--VERSION  7.0 > exit
```
title: wide-transcription not work with  interactive remoting
